label: Zapier
description: Use Webhooks/Code steps to call the API with your key. Keys are universal; picking Zapier just tags usage.

label: n8n
description: Call the API from HTTP Request or Code nodes. Keys are universal and can be used anywhere; selecting n8n just tags usage.

label: Google Sheets
description: Use Apps Script or connectors to hit the API. Integration selection only tags usage; keys are universal.

label: Custom
description: Use this key in your own app/service. Keys are universal; this tag helps organize usage by platform.
